ygData.subject: Faction with Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: Only sure fire way to find out why something is still scowling at you is to run up and see what it says before it attacks you. Dragoon says Bards like you are
ygData.messageBody:
Only sure fire way to find out why something is still scowling
at you is to run up and see what it says before it attacks you.

Dragoon says 'Bards like you are an affront to my senses.'

-or-

Dragoon says 'Your belief in a false god leaves me no choice.'


(either way you will figure out why he's pissed off, if those
guards are class/religion driven)

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
